articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Hungnam Smeltery and Fisheries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Hungnam Smeltery and Fisheries
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave on-the-spot guidance to the Hungnam Smeltery, the Hungnam Taehung Fishery Enterprise and the Sojung Fishery Station.
					 The first leg of his guidance was the Hungnam Smeltery.
					
					 He looked round the Hard Alloyed Steel Shop and various other production processes to acquaint himself in detail with the technological updating and production there.
					
					 Watching quality products being churned out from the modern production processes in an endless stream, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the officials, workers and technicians of the smeltery have laid a solid material and technological foundation and kept the production going at a high rate by dynamically pushing ahead with the technological updating by their own efforts and with their technology. He highly appreciated their laudable feats.
					
					 The smeltery has satisfactorily solved a lot of scientific and technological problems and waged a dynamic drive for modernizing and scientizing the production processes by paying primary attention to the technical revolution as required by the WPK's idea of attaching importance to science and technology, thus bringing about a signal turn in the production of nonferrous metals, he noted, adding that this eye-opening great change once again clearly proves that the master key to boosting the production lies in the technological progress.
					
					 He set forth important tasks to be fulfilled by the enterprise, noting that the smeltery has an important role to play in the nation's economic development.
					
					 He said that the most important task facing the smeltery is to keep the production going at a high rate and, at the same time, continue focusing efforts on the technological updating to put all the production processes on a higher scientific and technological basis.
					
					 The next leg of his guidance was the Hungnam Taehung Fishery Enterprise.
					
					 He went round the blister plastic shop and other production processes and varieties of processed fish for hours to learn in detail about the technical equipment and production there.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the officials, workers and technicians of the enterprise have not only systematically increased the fish production by modernizing and scientizing fishing equipment including fishing boats by themselves but successfully built the Unjong Health Complex and a sanatorium and other cultural and welfare establishments, radically changing its appearance. He highly appreciated their feats.
					
					 Noting that the enterprise has an important role to play in improving people's diet, he set forth the tasks to be carried out by the enterprise.
					
					 In order to increase the haul of fish and the production of processed fish it is necessary to make fishing boats all-purpose ones for the purpose of catching more fish by various methods and improve the technical control over the processing equipment and the management of other equipment with a view to boosting the rate of their operation, he said.
					
					 He stressed the need to more thoroughly establish a scientific fishing system and conduct the work for exploring new fishing grounds under a long-term plan in order to conduct fishing operations as required by the changed fishing conditions.
					
					 After setting the goal of aquatic products to be attained by the enterprise in a few years to come, he called for hitting the target without fail to increase the supply of fish to people.
					
					 As our country sea-bound on its three sides has favorable natural and geographical conditions for developing the fishing industry, it is necessary to pay deep attention to this work, he said, indicating an orientation and ways to do so.
					
					 The last leg of his guidance was the Sojung Fishery Station.
					
					 Making the rounds of fish-breeding tanks, wharf and various places of the station to learn in detail about production and fish keeping.
					
					 If the fish production is increased and, at the same time, some of the caught fish is let grow in the fish-breeding tanks before its supply just as done at this fishery station, it is possible to supply fresh fish to people at all times, he said, setting forth tasks to be fulfilled to spruce up the fish-breeding facilities and put their management on a scientific basis.
					
					 Noting that the powerful heavy industry of the DPRK including the metal industry has begun to display its potential, making a definite breakthrough towards bringing about leaping progress in light industry, agriculture and fishery industry, he earnestly called on all sectors of the national economy to effect great changes in order to make this historic year a year of a decisive turn in improving the people's standard of living.
					
					 He was accompanied by Thae Jong Su, chief secretary of the South Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the WPK, and Kim Kyong Hui, department director of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Ok Pong Rin
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Ok Pong Rin
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il on Wednesday sent a wreath to the bier of Ok Pong Rin, alternate member of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and a researcher of Kim Il Sung Political University, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: DPRK FM Hosts Reception for Russian Diplomats
articles.content:
DPRK FM Hosts Reception for Russian Diplomats
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Foreign Ministry Tuesday hosted a reception for staff members of the Russian embassy here on the occasion of the New Year.
					 Present there on invitation were Valery Sukhinin, Russian ambassador, and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs, in his speech at the reception referred to the fact that last year high-level delegations and famous art troupes of Russia visited the DPRK, adding that General Secretary Kim Jong Il, though busy with his Songun revolutionary leadership, watched together with the staff members of the Russian embassy performances given by Russian art troupes.
					
					 Recalling that this year marks the 10th anniversary of the publication of the DPRK-Russia joint declaration, the 10th anniversary of the conclusion of the treaty of friendship, good-neighborliness and cooperation between the two countries and the 65th anniversary of Korea's liberation, he expressed hope that there would be fruits in the work to boost the DPRK-Russia relations in the new year, too, as required by the spirit of the joint documents.
					
					 Valery Sukhinin in his speech referred to the fact that the Korean people achieved great successes in the socio-economic fields last year.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, has paid deep attention to the development of the relations between the two countries, he noted.
					
					 Saying that this year marks the significant anniversaries, he stressed that he and his staff would join Korean comrades in making positive efforts for the development of the bilateral friendly relations.

articles.title: 1st Meeting of Korea Taepung I IG Held
articles.content:
1st Meeting of Korea Taepung I IG Held
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The first meeting of the Board of Directors of the Korea Taepung International Investment Group took place at Yanggakdo International Hotel on Wednesday.
					 It was attended by directors of the board of the group and officials concerned as observers.
					
					 Conveyed there were an order of the chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission "On ensuring the activities of the Korea Taepung International Investment Group" and decisions of the DPRK NDC "On establishing the State Development Bank" and "On setting up the Coordinating Committee of the Korea Taepung International Investment Group". 
					
					  At the meeting Kim Yang Gon, chairman of the Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee, was elected director-general of the board of the group and Pak Chol Su, a Korean resident in China, permanent deputy director-general and president of the group.
					
					 The board of directors is made up of seven persons including representatives of the National Defence Commission, the Cabinet, the Ministry of Finance and an office concerned of the DPRK, the Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee and the Korea Taepung International Investment Group.
					
					 The meeting decided to set up a secretariat of the board of directors and named its members.
					
					 It deliberated and decided on the draft rules of the Korea Taepung International Investment Group, its action program and financial budget bill for 2010, a resolution on starting the operation of a preparatory committee for establishment of the State Development Bank and other agenda items related to the work of the group.
					
					 Kim Yang Gon made a keynote report and Pak Chol Su an address on the work of the group at the meeting.
					
					 The group, an external economic cooperation body, will play the role of an economic complex ensuring the induction of investment and finances for the State Development Bank, and it will be headquartered in Pyongyang.
					
					 The State Development Bank is to provide investment on major projects to be carried out according to the state policy after being equipped with advanced banking rules and system needed for transactions with international monetary organizations and commercial banks.

articles.title: Friendly Meeting with Italian Parliamentary Delegation
articles.content:
Friendly Meeting with Italian Parliamentary Delegation
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- A friendly meeting with members of the delegation of lawmakers from various political parties of Italy was held at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday.
					Present there on invitation were members of the delegation headed by Osvaldo Napoli, vice-president of the Parliamentary Group of the People of Liberty of the Chamber of Deputies who is chairman of the Committee for the Development of Relations and Cooperation with the DPRK of the Parliament.
					
					 Ri Jong Hyok, deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK who is chairman of the DPRK-Italy Friendship Parliamentary Group, and members of the group were on hand.
					
					 The participants talked to each other about the matter of further developing the relations between the parliaments of two countries, deepening friendship.

articles.title: New Year Celebrated by Officials in China
articles.content:
New Year Celebrated by Officials in China 
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- A friendly meeting of officials of the DPRK embassy in Beijing and officials of the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China was held in the capital of China on Jan. 18 on the occasion of the New Year.
					 Present there were Choe Jin Su, DPRK ambassador to China, and officials of his embassy and Liu Hongcai, deputy head of the ILD of the C.C., the CPC, and other officials of the department.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The DPRK ambassador referred to the fact that last year functions commemorating the "year of the DPRK-China friendship" were held and visits by high-level delegations took place between the two countries and friendship and cooperation were successfully conducted in various fields under the care of their top leaders. 
					
					 It is the consistent stand of the Workers' Party of Korea and the government of the DPRK to steadily develop the DPRK-China friendship, he said, expressing the will to continue boosting the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties and countries in the new year, too.
					
					 The deputy head of the above-said department of the C.C., the CPC, noted that last year the Korean people made remarkable successes in the 150-day and 100-day campaigns by effecting a new great revolutionary surge under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He expressed belief that both sides would closely cooperate with each other to put the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries onto a higher stage this year, too.
					
					 Meanwhile, the DPRK embassy in Beijing arranged a reception for officials of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of China on Jan. 14 and the DPRK consulate general in Shenyang hosted a reception for officials in charge of foreign affairs of the Liaoning Provincial People's Government on Jan. 15.

articles.title: Noble Intention for Development of Light Industry
articles.content:
Noble Intention for Development of Light Industry
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung made public a famous work, "On Some Immediate Tasks Facing the Light Industry Sector," on January 20, Juche 54 (1965).
					 In the work he noted that it was very important for the officials of the then State Light Industry Commission to enhance their role and loyalty to the Workers' Party of Korea, to the working class and to the people and equip themselves with correct guiding methods.
					
					 He called for taking special measures to attain the textile output goal of the seven-year plan, mass-producing sundry goods and bettering the quality of light industry goods including clothes and footwear.
					
					 He also noted foodstuff industry should be extensively developed to process meat, vegetables, fish and fruits well in time. 
					
					What he instructed in the work provides a glimpse of his strenuous thoughts and efforts dedicated to the betterment of the people's living.
					
					 The President, who set it as the WPK's overriding principle in its activities to steadily improve the people's living standard, wisely steered the efforts for consolidating the production potentials of light industry.
					
					 The Korean people have turned out as one in an all-Party, nationwide campaign for implementing the tasks put forward in the joint New Year editorial, published by leading newspapers of the country, for mass-producing consumer goods in line with the Party's policy of effecting a radical turn in light industry.
					
					 It is the firm determination and will of the WPK to realize without fail the noble intention and desire of the President, who devoted his heart and soul to the people all his life.
					
					 The Korean people, true to the behest of the President, will surely make this a year of a drastic turn in improving the people's living standard, a prosperous year filled with the people's happiness, under the leadership of the great Party.

articles.title: Guidelines for Solving Socialist Rural Question
articles.content:
Guidelines for Solving Socialist Rural Question
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Thirty-five years has passed since General Secretary Kim Jong Il issued a famous work, "On Enhancing the Role of Party Organizations in Implementing the Theses on the Socialist Rural Question," on January 20, Juche 64 (1975).
					 He noted in the work that the theses expounded by President Kim Il Sung serve as a grand programme for ultimately solving the rural question and achieving the final victory of socialism.
					
					 The theses, which clearly indicate for the first time in history the principles and methods of solving the rural question after the establishment of socialist system, have fully proved their validity and vitality in practice.
					
					 Kim Jong Il clarified that for the purpose of ultimately implementing the theses it is necessary to switch over cooperative property into public one and the Workers' Party of Korea organizations at all levels should dynamically push ahead with the three revolutions -- ideological, technical and cultural -- in rural communities.
					
					 The WPK has consolidated the political and ideological bases in the rural communities by instilling the spirit of collectivism into the peasants and conducting a vigorous ideological campaign against outmoded ideas, while informing them of its agricultural policies in time and waging the political work well for their implementation among them.
					
					 It has also made sure that the technical revolution has been promoted vigorously in rural areas for a comprehensive mechanization and application of chemistry in agriculture, along with the cultural revolution for improving the peasants' common knowledge and techniques and establishing cultured ways in their work and life.
					
					 Underscoring the role of the state institutions of guiding agriculture, particularly the important position and role of county, he stressed that the theses can be implemented successfully, given rich experience gained in the effort for the settlement of the rural question, seasoned leadership of the Party, good people and solid foundations of the self-supporting national economy.
					
					 His idea of raising the Party's leadership role in solving the rural question has confirmed its effect in the tremendous achievements made in agricultural production and rural construction in recent years.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers' Saber-rattling under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers' Saber-rattling under Fire
						
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The 26th motorized infantry division of the south Korean puppet army staged field mobile exercises under the pretext of "boosting combat capability" in the area of Kyonggi Province between Jan. 11 and 15.
					 Minju Joson Wednesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard: These are nothing but deliberate saber-rattling to disturb national reconciliation and unity, the process for warming the inter-Korean relations and screw up the tensions. 
					
					 If national reconciliation and unity are to be achieved and the inter-Korean ties to be improved it is necessary to put an end to the confrontation and war racket, first of all.
					
					 It is self-evident that national reconciliation and unity can hardly be achieved and the inter-Korean ties cannot be improved as long as war exercises are staged to threaten and hurt the other party.
					
					 The frantic war exercises of the south Korean warhawks for a war of aggression against the north are intended to realize their sinister scenario to block national reconciliation and unity and torpedo the process for improving the inter-Korean ties and bring the situation to the brink of a war at any cost. It is an unpardonable criminal act going against the desire of fellow countrymen.
					
					 It is the unanimous desire of the Koreans to achieve national reconciliation and unity and warm the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 It is the consistent stand of the DPRK to improve the inter-Korean ties and pave the way for national reunification on the basis of the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.  
					
					Good will cannot be shown even for the warmongers keen to do harm to fellow countrymen in contravention of the inter-Korean joint declarations. It is the mettle of the army and people of the DPRK to return fire for fire. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities would be well advised to behave themselves, cogitating about the consequences to be entailed by their war exercises for invading the north.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Redeem Its Past Crimes without Delay
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Redeem Its Past Crimes without Delay
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Japan should fully redeem its inglorious past and turn over a new leaf at an early date. Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes this in a signed article.
					 Nothing is more important and urgent task for Japan than to redeem the hideous crimes it committed against humanity in the first half of the last century, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 It is quite natural for the criminals to admit the responsibility for their crimes and face a punishment for them and make apology and reparation to the victims from a legal and moral point of view.
					
					 Japan should no longer delay the settlement of its past even in the light of the international trend. It has become a trend in the international relations to feel responsibility for the past wrongdoings and make apology and reparation to the victims.
					
					 Japan is required to liquidate its past to live with clean conscience as a member of the international community. Japan was universally registered as an "enemy state" in the UN Charter when the Second World War was over but it has not yet shaken off this ill-fame.
					
					 Japan should properly settle its past if it wants to develop the relations of good neighborliness and friendship with other countries. 
					
					 Now that cooperation and exchange are brisk among countries Japan's behavior of evading the settlement of its past would only precipitate its isolation and destruction.
					
					 For Japan to honestly admit its wrongdoings and fully redress them is the only way of getting rid of guilty conscience.
					
					 Whether Japan will be able to live with clean conscience as a member of the international community or not depends on its attitude.

articles.title: Vigorous Drive for National Reunification Called for
articles.content:
Vigorous Drive for National Reunification Called for
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- All Koreans in the north and the south and abroad should crown this significant year, 2010, as a historic year to be specially recorded in the history of the movement for reunification by dynamically accelerating the grand march toward national reunification with firm confidence.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday stresses this in a signed article.
					
					 "Let the entire nation unite under the banner of north-south joint declarations and achieve national reunification at the earliest date!", a slogan set forth in the joint New Year editorial, reflects the strong faith and will of the Korean nation to steadily glorify the dignified history of the June 15 era of reunification and lead it to accomplishing the cause of independent reunification by making a signal advance in the movement for national reunification this significant year marking the 10th anniversary of the publication of the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration, the article notes, and says:
					
					 Over the last decade the Korean nation has deeply realized the validity and vitality of the north-south joint declarations, the one and only great programme for independent reunification and the invincible banner that should be always upheld till the day when the cause of national reunification is accomplished.
					
					 In order to give steady continuity to the drive for independent reunification, peace and prosperity ushered in by the June 15 era of reunification, it is necessary, above all, to wage a vigorous struggle against the separatists obstructive to it at home and abroad.
					
					 Without staunch struggle against the anti-reunification moves, is it impossible to prevent the precious achievements, gained by the Koreans in the movement for national reunification in the said era, from being vanished. It is an urgent demand of the reality to meet the ceaseless anti-reunification challenges and powerfully accelerate the advance of the said era.
					
					 What is important in pushing forward the advance of the June 15 era of reunification is to achieve the alliance and solidarity among the fellow countrymen in the north and the south and abroad and the great unity of the entire nation under the banner of "By our nation itself".
					
					 To strengthen the great unity of the entire nation serves as a fundamental guarantee for the pro-reunification patriotic forces to overpower the separatist forces and intensify the movement for national reunification.
					
					 Vicious are the moves of the separatist forces at home and abroad to block the advance of the June 15 era of reunification, but they can never break the desire and will of the Koreans to achieve the independent reunification and national prosperity through the implementation of the north-south joint declarations. It is irresistible inevitability that the pro-reunification patriotic forces prevail over the separatist forces to emerge victorious.

articles.title: Maximum Speed of March for Great Surge Called for
articles.content:
Maximum Speed of March for Great Surge Called for
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday editorially calls upon all the Korean people to maximize the speed of the march for a great surge, fully confident of victory under the leadership of Kim Jong Il, and thus glorify this year, the 65th anniversary of the foundation of the Workers' Party of Korea, as a year of great changes to be specially recorded in the history of building of a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					 It is the firm belief of the army and people of the DPRK that a victory is sure to be won in the drive for effecting a great surge and all their ideals will certainly be translated into brilliant realities as Kim Jong Il determines and leads them, the editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					 The service personnel and people's conviction of victory represents the great pride that there is no limit to the might of their single-minded unity and spiritual strength and the firm belief in their inexhaustible strength and potential.
					
					 The eye-opening victories and successes gained by the service personnel and people in the on-going gigantic march for a great surge signify a victory of the single-minded unity and spiritual strength.
					
					 Neither sanctions nor pressures on the part of the imperialists and neither difficulties nor trials can ever overpower the might of the harmonious whole of the army and people of the DPRK in which the Party believes in the people and they devotedly defend the Party and the leader. All the service personnel and people will, at the same time, record with high pride the heroic epics of creation and changes glorifying the history of the DPRK in this year's general offensive, too, with the might of their single-minded unity and indomitable spiritual strength, firmly rallied around the headquarters of the revolution.
					
					 Today the national power of the DPRK has reached its peak in all aspects. As the economic power of the DPRK has grown remarkably stronger thanks to the high-pitched drive for a great surge, it is now demonstrating its might as a political, ideological and military power and has in place a springboard from which it can proudly leap towards a high eminence of an economic power. There is nothing to fear and nothing impossible for the DPRK. The Korean people can work world-startling miracles once again and open the gate to a thriving nation earlier than scheduled when they tap all the economic and technical potentials and possibilities and make redoubled efforts.

articles.title: Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration Called for
articles.content:
Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration Called for
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The June 15 Single-minded Society for Reunification of south Korea made up of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, the Society of April Revolution and the Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy, etc. held a meeting in Seoul on Jan. 17 in which it expressed the will to take the lead in the implementation of the inter-Korean joint declaration.
					 The participants of the meeting declared they would wage a dynamic struggle for achieving the independent reunification this year which marks the 10th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 Noting that the society would take the lead in the struggle for the implementation of the inter-Korean joint declaration, they demanded the authorities roll back their policy of confrontation against the DPRK at once and opt for the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: DPRK FM Statement Supported
articles.content:
DPRK FM Statement Supported 
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Director-General of the International Institute of the Juche Idea Vishwanath issued a statement on Jan. 14 in support of the statement issued by the DPRK Foreign Ministry. 
					 He in his statement said that it is of very weighty significance that the ministry proposed to the parties to the Armistice Agreement an early start of the talks for replacing the AA by a peace treaty this year, demanding the U.S. government sincerely respond to the proposal of the DPRK and positively opt for the work to build confidence between the two countries. 
					
					 A peace treaty should be concluded, above all, to terminate the state of war, the root cause of the hostile relations, in order to build confidence between the DPRK and the U.S., he said, hoping that the U.S. would pull down the barrier of discrimination and distrust called sanctions against the DPRK.
					
					 D. Raja, secretary of the National Council of the Communist Party of India, in his statement released on the same day extended full support and firm solidarity to the Workers' Party of Korea and the people of the DPRK in their efforts to replace the AA by a peace treaty.

articles.title: Joint New Year Editorial Supported in Peru
articles.content:
Joint New Year Editorial Supported in Peru
						
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea issued a statement on Jan. 8 in support of the joint New Year editorial of the DPRK.
					 The statement congratulated the Korean people on their successes achieved last year under the wise Songun leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It spoke highly of the progress made by the Juche-oriented science and technology of the DPRK; it launched the satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 by its own efforts and technology in particular, striking the world with admiration, and succeeded in the 2nd underground nuclear test, making a contribution to bolstering up the self-reliant national defence capability.
					
					 It highly appreciated the diplomatic victory the DPRK won by frustrating the moves of the U.S. imperialists, Japan and the south Korean puppets to block the victorious advance of socialism.
					
					 It expressed full support to the joint editorial which set the clear goal to improve the people's standard of living including the development of light industry, thereby clarifying the will of the Korean people to open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung, without fail.
					
					 The statement held that new progress should be made in the efforts to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea, the desire of the whole humankind, this year in line with the principle laid down in the declarations adopted at the historic inter-Korean summits held in June of 2000 and October of 2007. It reiterated the solidarity with the struggle of the Korean people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Pakistan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Pakistan 
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might" was brought out in pamphlet by the Victorial Publishing House of Pakistan.
					 A book releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on Jan. 15.

articles.title: Story of Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Story of Kim Jong Suk
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- One day in August Juche 37 (1948), anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk in simple attire went to the polls. At that time nobody recognized her.
					 Later an official hurried to her and invited her to vote before others.
					
					 Refusing his offer, she told him that she would cast her vote in due order together with other people.
					
					 When he repeated his offer, she told him that she was just one of voters. Then she persisted in waiting for her turn in a long queue.  
					
					 The official was much touched by the humble behavior of Kim Jong Suk.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia campana de enfrentamiento de ejercito surcoreano
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia campana de enfrentamiento de ejercito surcoreano
Pyongyang, 20 de enero (ATCC) -- A partir del dia 11 al 15, la division de infanteria motorizada No.26 de las fuerzas terrestres del ejercito titere surcoreano libro el ejercicio movil al aire libre en la zona de la provincia de Kyonggi bajo el pretexto de "mejoramiento de la combatividad".
					Esto es una campana belica malintencionada para obstaculizar la reconciliacion y la unidad nacionales y el mejoramiento de las relaciones intercoreanas y agravar la tension.
					
					Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual difundido este miercoles y continua:
					
					Es necesario eliminar, ante todo, el alboroto de enfrentamiento y guerra para lograr la reconciliacion y la unidad nacionales y mejorar las relaciones Norte-Sur.
					
					Es evidente que seran inalcanzables esas metas en medio de las detonaciones de obuses para amenazar y danar a la contraparte.
					
					Ese imperdonable acto criminal de los belicistas surcoreanos, que parte de la siniestra intencion de llevar la situacion al borde de guerra, contraviene a la unanime aspiracion nacional a la reconciliacion y la unidad nacionales y al mejoramiento de las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					Es invariable la posicion de la RPDC de mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas y forjar el camino de la reunificacion de la patria a base de la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre. Pero, ella no puede mostrarse benevola hasta con los belicistas que actuan freneticamente para atacar a los connacionales en contrasentido a dichos documentos Norte-Sur. Responder con el fuego al fuego es el temperamento del ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben actuar con prudencia meditando seriamente de la consecuencia que tendra su campana para la guerra de agresion al Norte.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun exhorta a maximizar la velocidad de avance
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun exhorta a maximizar la velocidad de avance
Pyongyang, 20 de enero (ATCC) -- En un editorial difundido el dia 20, el diario Rodong Sinmun exhorto a todos a maximizar la velocidad de avance por el gran auge bajo la guia del Dirigente          Kim Jong Il y con gran fe en la victoria a fin de hacer brillar este ano del aniversario 65 de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea como un ano de gran cambio que se registre con letras mayusculas en la historia de construccion de la gran potencia prospera.
					Gracias a la decision y la orientacion del Dirigente, es definitiva la victoria del gran auge y se realizaran sin falta de modo brillante todos ideales nuestros, he aqui la inconmovible conviccion profundamente arraigada en el corazon del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea, senala el diario y prosigue:
					
					Tal fe de los triunfadores se basa en el gran orgullo de la ilimitada potencia de nuestra unidad monolitica y fuerza espiritual y en la conviccion de nuestras inagotables fuerzas y potencialidades.
					
					Las asombrosas victorias y exitos, que alcanzan nuestro ejercito y pueblo en el gigantesco avance por el gran auge de hoy, son el triunfo de la unidad compacta y de la fuerza espiritual.
					
					Ninguna sancion y presion de los imperialistas y ninguna dificultad y prueba podran vencer el poderio de nuestra union de cuerpo y alma, segun la cual el Partido confia en el pueblo y este defiende a costa de la vida a aquel y al lider.
					
					En la ofensiva general de este ano tambien, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea escribiran con orgullo la epopeya heroica de creaciones e innovaciones que glorificara los anales de la patria, valiendose del poderio de la unidad monolitica y la indoblegable fuerza espiritual de todo el ejercito y el pueblo unidos compactamente en torno a la Direccion de la Revolucion.
					
					Hoy dia, nuestro poderio nacional llego al plano cimero en todos los aspectos.
					
					Gracias al crecimiento considerable del poderio economico del pais en el fragor del gran auge, nuestra patria, que ya ostenta su gallardo aspecto de potencia ideo-politica y la militar, llego a contar con el trampolin de salto que la situara a la altura de digna potencia economica.
					
					Ya no hay nada temible ni imposible para nuestro pueblo.
					
					Si nuestro pueblo lucha redoblando sus esfuerzos y movilizando todas las potencialidades economicas y tecnicas y posibilidades, podra abrir con adelanto las puertas de la gran potencia prospera creando milagros que volveran a sorprender a todo el mundo.

articles.title: Entidad peruana reafirma la solidaridad con pueblo coreano
articles.content:
Entidad peruana reafirma la solidaridad con pueblo coreano 
Pyongyang, 20 de enero (ATCC) -- El Comite Peruano de Apoyo a la Reunificacion Independiente y Pacifica de Corea hizo publica el dia 8 una declaracion expresando su apoyo al editorial conjunto de los periodicos principales de Corea publicado con motivo del Ano Nuevo. 
					La nota felicita al pueblo coreano por sus exitos logrados en el ano pasado bajo la sabia direccion del Songun del Mariscal Kim Jong Il.
					
					En particular, evalua el desarrollo de la ciencia y tecnica autoctonas de Corea que contribuyo al fortalecimiento del poderio de la autodefensa nacional al lanzar con sus propias fuerzas y tecnologias el satelite artificial "Kwangmyongsong no.2", que admiro a todo el mundo, y al lograr exito en la segunda prueba nuclear subterranea. 
					
					Aprecia altamente el triunfo diplomatico de Corea que frustro las maniobras de los imperialistas estadounidenses, Japon y los titeres surcoreanos encaminadas a frenar el avance victorioso del socialismo. 
					
					Expresa irrestricto apoyo al editorial conjunto que presento la clara meta para la mejora de la vida del pueblo incluso el desarrollo de la industria ligera y aclaro la voluntad del pueblo coreano de abrir a toda costa las puertas a la gran potencia prospera en el ano 2012 en que se cumplira el centenario del natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung. 
					
					Apunta que este ano se debera lograr un nuevo avance en la realizacion de la reunificacion independiente y pacifica de Corea, a la que aspira toda la humanidad, segun los principios de las declaraciones aprobadas en los historicos encuentros Cumbres Norte-Sur en junio de 2000 y en octubre de 2007.
					
					Por fin, la nota reafirma la solidaridad con la lucha del pueblo coreano.

articles.title: Preciosa guia para resolver el problema rural socialista
articles.content:
Preciosa guia para resolver el problema rural socialista
						
Pyongyang, 20 de enero (ATCC) -- Hoy se cumple el 35o aniversario de publicacion de la obra maestra del Dirigente Kim Jong Il "Para elevar el papel de las organizaciones del partido en la lucha por materializar la tesis sobre el problema rural socialista".
					  En la obra el Dirigente destaco que dicha tesis presentada por el Presidente Kim Il Sung es gran programa de construccion socialista que ilumino claramente el camino para resolver definitivamente el problema rural y lograr la victoria total del socialismo.
					
					  La tesis en cuestion enseno con toda claridad por primera vez en la historia los principios y remedios para la solucion del problema rural en los tiempos posteriores al establecimiento del regimen socialista.
					
					  Despues de su publicacion, fueron comprobadas en la practica la justeza y vitalidad de ella.
					
					  El Dirigente subrayo que para materializarla perfectamente, hay que convertir las propiedades cooperativistas en las estatales y, especialmente, las organizaciones a todos los niveles del Partido del Trabajo de Corea deben impulsar dinamicamente en las areas rurales las tres revoluciones: la ideologica, la tecnica y la cultural.
					
					  Anteriormente, el PTC vino consolidando la base politico-ideologica del campo dando a conocer a tiempo a los campesinos la politica del partido sobre la agricultura y realizando bien la labor politica para materializarla.
					
					Al mismo tiempo, vino inculcando en los agricultores el espiritu colectivista y librando una dinamica lucha de ideas por rechazar los pensamientos caducos.
					
					  Tambien ha dado buen impulso a la revolucion tecnologica rural encaminada a la mecanizacion general y a la fundamentacion quimica de la economia rural.
					
					Mientras tanto, se libro incesantemente la campana para elevar el nivel de conocimientos generales y el tecnico de los campesinos y establecer la cultura de trabajo y de vida promoviendo energicamente la revolucion cultural.
					
					  El Dirigente senalo ademas en su trabajo que es preciso elevar el papel de los organos estatales de direccion sobre la rama agricola y preciso que son muy importantes la posicion y el papel del distrito.
					
					  Prosiguio que es posible realizar perfectamente la tesis mencionada mientras haya las experiencias abundantes en la solucion del problema rural, la direccion probada del partido, el buen pueblo y la base solida de la economia nacional autarquica.
					
					  Las ventajas de la idea del Dirigente Kim Jong Il de elevar el papel directriz del partido en la solucion del problema rural quedaron confirmadas tambien por los exitos de los ultimos anos, tales como los resultados trascendentales dados en la produccion agricola y la construccion rural y la conversion de numerosas granjas cooperativas en los poblados ideales de la gran potencia prospera.
